bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Charles Page Bryan was a diplomat and politician.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains principally scrapbooks relating to Bryan's service as U.S. ambassador to Brazil (1898-1902), Portugal (1903-1909), Belgium (1909-1911) and Japan (1911-1912) and containing newspaper clippings, press releases, photographs, postcards, greeting cards and other memorabilia. It also includes a scrapbook of family photographs, political memorabilia, and genealogy as well as political correspondence from 1879-1909.
